word_mean: 曲张的：具有血管曲张特征的，或属于血管曲张的
不自然的，持续扩张的，指静脉

sentence.Network_en: My mother has had unsightly varicose veins for years.
sentence.Network_cn: 我母亲多年来一直患有难看的静脉曲张。

sentence.Network_en: Surgical waiting lists were reduced by the simple expedient of striking off all patients awaiting varicose vein operations.
sentence.Network_cn: 采取了将所有等待进行静脉曲张手术的病人从名单上删除的简单做法，这一权宜之计使得外科手术等待名单得以缩减。

sentence.Network_en: They had dressed his varicose ulcer with soothing ointment.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在静脉曲张的疮口上抹了清凉的油膏.
